DatasetImportJob.description: Initial DatasetImportJob for the created dataset

properties.name: DataSource
properties.description: The Amazon S3 bucket that contains the training data to import.

type.description: The Amazon S3 bucket that contains the training data to import.

properties.name: DataLocation
properties.description: The path to the Amazon S3 bucket where the data that you want to upload to your dataset is stored.

type.description: The path to the Amazon S3 bucket where the data that you want to upload to your dataset is stored.

properties.name: DatasetArn
properties.description: The ARN of the dataset that receives the imported data

type.description: The ARN of the dataset that receives the imported data

properties.name: DatasetImportJobArn
properties.description: The ARN of the dataset import job

type.description: The ARN of the dataset import job

properties.name: JobName
properties.description: The name for the dataset import job.

type.description: The name for the dataset import job.

properties.name: RoleArn
properties.description: The ARN of the IAM role that has permissions to read from the Amazon S3 data source.

type.description: The ARN of the IAM role that has permissions to read from the Amazon S3 data source.

properties.name: DatasetGroupArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset group to add the dataset to

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset group to add the dataset to

properties.name: SchemaArn
properties.description: The ARN of the schema to associate with the dataset. The schema defines the dataset fields.

type.description: The ARN of the schema to associate with the dataset. The schema defines the dataset fields.
